mapper.select: select g.*,gb.`name` as goods_brand_name, gc.`name` as goods_cate_name, gp.url as main_pic from goods as g left join goods_brand as gb on gb.id = g.brand_id and gb.is_del = 0 left join goods_cate as gc on gc.id = g.cate_id and gc.is_del = 0 left join goods_pics as gp on gp.goods_id = g.id and gp.is_del = 0 ${ew.sqlSegment}
